title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 35.5 - Review process
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 35.5 - Review process

State Regulations
(a) Applications
shall be reviewed by the Licensing Bureau. A determination on an application
shall be made within 10 business days of the authority's receipt of the
application. (b) In the event that
the application is disapproved, the licensee may seek reconsideration of the
determination by the members of the authority. (c) Requests for reconsideration shall be
submitted in writing to the Chairman's Office, 80 South Swan Street, Suite 900, Albany, NY 12210-8002. Such requests shall then be reviewed by a member of the
authority. A determination on the request shall be made within 10 business days
after receipt of the request. (d) A
decision by a member of the authority on a request for reconsideration shall be
considered a final determination of the authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
35.5

Amended

New

York State Register August 12, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 32, eff. 8/12/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
